reviewText: A great film  two men once friends now on opposites of the law you have plenty of action violence and believe or not A little Romance it leads to A bad way for someone.  Can't wait for the Tv series on DVD.
Not the version I watched twenty years ago
Wish they'd release this whole series. Great TV!

I thought it was great my one of my favorite series. I didn't know it was the pilot,  being a former law-enforcement official, the acting was great I found it to be  very realistic. I would like to know if you have any information I would like to purchase the entire series thank you
